title: Candle Warmer Lamp, Wax Melt Warmer with Timer Dimmer, Height Adjustable, Amber Lampshade, Includes 2 Bulbs, Birthday Gifts for Women, Mom, Christmas, Housewarming
features: [Flameless & Safe] No open flame, no soot, no smoke — a fire-safe fragrance experience that makes our candle warmer perfect for homes with kids and pets
[Precise Timer & Dimming Control] Integrated timer (2/4/8 hr) and adjustable brightness control let you personalize scent release and mood lighting—energy-efficient and convenient
[Height Adjustable Design] Adjustable neck allows compatibility with a variety of candle sizes—from short jar candles to 3-wick jars—ensuring optimal melting and even scent distribution

[Crystal-Clear, Shatter-Resistant Shade] Our premium acrylic lampshade delivers the clarity of glass without the risk of breakage—durable, lightweight, and perfect for daily use or as a stylish home decor accent

[Elegant Gift-Ready Décor] This candle warmer combines modern aesthetics with functionality—perfect Gift for Mom, Christmas, Housewarming, Birthday, or Mother’s Day. Makes a stylish addition to any living room, bedroom, office, or yoga room
